definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: This paper describes the toxicity and harm of hydrogen arsenide.
sentences.chinese: 這篇文章介紹了砷化氫的毒性及危害性。

sentences.english: Diagnostic criteria and principles of management of occupational acute arsine poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 職業性急性砷化氫中毒診斷標準及處理原則。

sentences.english: Objective To study the characteristics of patients with acute arsine poisoning and its possible treatments.
sentences.chinese: 目的探究羣發性急性砷化氫中毒的臨牀特點及治療。

sentences.english: This paper describes the toxicity and harm of hydrogen arsenide.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了砷化氫的毒性及危害性。
